Description: The following statement contains a magic number: (new TestScheduler()).With(sched =>              {                  var sut = new PersonViewModel {FirstName = "Jane"' LastName = "Appleseed"};                  Assert.IsTrue(sut.ChangeName.CanExecute(null));                    sut.ChangeName.ExecuteAsync().Subscribe();                    sched.AdvanceByMs(1000);                  Assert.AreEqual(null' sut.ServerResult);                    sched.AdvanceByMs(10000);                  Assert.AreEqual("Hello World"' sut.ServerResult);              });
